signature: SetView<E> union(Set<? extends E>, Set<? extends E>)

enhanced_by.method_name: difference(Set<? extends E>, Set<? extends E>)
enhanced_by.reason: The union method uses the difference method to compute the elements in setB that are not in setA, which can be reused for setting up the test environment.
Both union and difference methods require initialization of sets, which can be abstracted into a common setup method.
The union method may require a specific environment setup before execution, such as initializing collections or setting up dependencies.

enhanced_by.method_name: validateSets(Set<? extends E>, Set<? extends E>)
enhanced_by.reason: The union method requires non-null sets as input, and a validation method can ensure this precondition is met before execution.
